Subject: Major Incident Resolved: Oracle Unavailability impacting EBS, Payroll, Warehouse, Customer and Digital integrations
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

      

 

Major Incident Resolved: Oracle Unavailability impacting EBS, Payroll, Warehouse, Customer and Digital integrations

_________________________________________________________________

Date: 24 Sep 2024

Time: 12:55 PM GST


Services have been successfully restored. The tech teams are currently reprocessing the transactions that have failed during this outage which will be completed within the next hour.

Thank you for your patience.

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C18d2685793c94338cb7c08dcdc9eb11d%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627822709309570%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=YMv7tbWIhprfcQaQxJoeo0m6rNNhCDFsNuUcnIr8ztE%3D&reserved=0> .
